bug.author: HanGuo97
bug.summary: "reuse" argument in tf.layers.Dense documentation should be renamed to "_reuse"
bug.description:
Please make sure that this is a documentation issue. As per our GitHub Policy, we only address code/doc bugs, performance issues, feature requests and build/installation issues on GitHub. tag:doc_template System information
TensorFlow version: 1.12 Doc Link: https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/layers/Dense
Describe the documentation issue reuse is no longer a valid argument, and should be replaced with _reuse instead. Passing reuse to Dense will cause the following error: TypeError: ('Keyword argument not understood:', 'reuse') We welcome contributions by users. Will you be able to update submit a PR (use the doc style guide) to fix the doc Issue?

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/HanGuo97>@HanGuo97</denchmark-link> Would you like creating a PR to fix the issue?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/HanGuo97>@HanGuo97</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/facaiy>@facaiy</denchmark-link> is anyone of you working on this issue? I am trying to start contributing to Tensorflow and this looks like a good starting point. I can work on this if it has not been assigned yet.
Welcome, feel free to take a try, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Sudeepam97>@Sudeepam97</denchmark-link> . Ping me if you need any help later :-)
My bad for the delayed response, was offline for the last couple of days due to the lunar new year, Iâ€™ll make a PR sometime today.
Looks like <denchmark-link:https://github.com/HanGuo97>@HanGuo97</denchmark-link> has fixed this issue. I suppose it can be closed now.

Yes, thank <denchmark-link:https://github.com/HanGuo97>@HanGuo97</denchmark-link> for your contribution :-) <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Sudeepam97>@Sudeepam97</denchmark-link> I think <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/25564>#25564</denchmark-link> is also a good issue for starter if you're interested in it.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/facaiy>@facaiy</denchmark-link> Thank you for pointing it out. I'll take a look at it.
